ja506:9.2: Hatthattamāgacchi → hatthattha māgañchi (bj) | hatthatthamāgacchi (sya1ed, sya2ed) | hatthattham āgañchi (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja506:11.1: pañcadasiñca → paṇṇarasiñca (bj) | paṇṇarasiṃ ca (sya1ed, sya2ed) | pannarasiñca (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja506:21.2: Saṃvaṭṭaye → saṃvaṭṭayaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | saṃvatteyya (sya1ed, sya2ed) | saṃvaṭṭeyya (mr)
ja506:21.3: samūlamuppate → ... mubbahe (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, Ma-aka) | ... muṭṭhahe (mr)
ja506:23.3: Maṃkāraṇā → mama kāraṇā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
